View.Label: 1.014 Fixer
Fixer will help you make corrections to the specific gravity of your wort. You'll need to know the target gravity, current gravity, temperature, and final volume.
Adjustments
Slide your finger up and down the screen to make adjustments to either gravity, temperature, or volume.
Units
Tap on any unit of measurement to change it's value. Gallons turns to liters, lbs turns to kilos, DME turns to LME.
